result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel L. J. Thoms was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Daniel L. J. Thoms is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Daniel L. J. Thoms was found guilty of Possession of synthetic cannabinoid, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(em).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Paid in full from cash bond posted

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel L. J. Thoms

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: 2:28 p.m. Defendant Daniel L. J. Thoms in court with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Schiek states agreement. State moves to dismiss Counts 2 and 3 - Granted. Plea questionnaire filed. Defendant enters no contest plea to Count 1.   Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty. Court finds defendant guilty and imposes forefeiture including costs totaling $579.00. Cash bond posted to be applied towards forefeiture; balance to be returned to poster. Appeal rights given.  Adj. 2:34 pm
States Reply to Discovery  and State's Demand for Discovery  - includes cover letter

4:17 p.m. Defendant Daniel L. J. Thoms in court with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  In receipt of complaint, waive reading - not guilty plea 
Bail continued. Adj. 4:19 p.m.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 7, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

3:40 p.m. Defendant Daniel L. J. Thoms in court.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is not represented by Attorney Rielly - will be meeting with Attorney Jolin, PD's office on Wednesday. Adj. 3:44 p.m.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

1:54 p.m. Defendant Daniel L. J. Thoms in court via video with attorney Michael John Rielly appearing telephonically with leave of court.  Defendant Daniel L. J. Thoms in custody.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant states he missed court appearance-Bednar statement to bond. Court sets $750 cash bond. Defendant statement to bond. Mother statement to attorney. Adj. 2:00 p.m.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 7, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Per Mary at ONSO - defendant now in ONSO
Per Mary in Eau Claire County jail - detainer placed

2:09 P.M. Defendant does not appear. Attorney Michael John Rielly in court.  Michael Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rielly statement that resolution is close - does not know where defendant is. Court authorizes warrant. Adj. 2:09 p.m.
States Reply to Discovery  and State's Demand for Discovery  - includes cover letter

2:55 p.m. Attorney Michael John Rielly in court.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Auhorization filed.   In receipt of complaint, waive reading - not guilty plea 
Bail continued  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 16, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

3:00 p.m. Defendant Daniel L. J. Thoms in court with attorney John E Voorhees.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Voorhees will not be representing --there is a conflict in his office - requests adjourned initial appearance  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

3:38 pm. Defendant Daniel L. J. Thoms in court.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant states was not eligible for PD - but is eligible now - Bail coninued  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 23, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel L. J. Thoms
Current: P.O. Box 1556, E147410 County Road D - Altoona, Woodruff, WI 54568 United States  (Effective: 09-11-2015)
Prior: E147410 County Road D, Altoona, WI 54742

2:00 p.m. Defendant Daniel L. J. Thoms in court.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  In receipt of complaint, right to counsel - defendant will seek counsel,  Schiek statement to bail - Court sets $ sig bond  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
1:58 p.m. Defendant Daniel L. J. Thoms not in court.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court authorizes warrant based on non appearance.
